meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in the intestines of humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the coliform under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The coliform in the water sample indicated contamination.
meanings.sent3: The coliform bacteria threw a party in the intestines.
meanings.sent4: The coliform spread like wildfire through the population.
meanings.sent5: The coliform bacteria were like unwelcome guests in the body.

meanings.definition: A group of bacteria used as indicators of water quality.
meanings.sent1: The presence of coliform in the water signaled a problem.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician tested for coliform levels in the river.
meanings.sent3: The coliform bacteria decided to go on strike in protest of pollution.
meanings.sent4: The coliform acted as guardians of water purity.
meanings.sent5: The coliform bacteria were like little detectives in the water system.
